alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 28 at 9:22PM EDT until August 30 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. .Storm surge associated with Hurricane Idalia is expected to cause major flooding on lower portions of the Alafia river on Wednesday. For the Alafia...including Riverview near US 301...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Alafia River at Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Water begins to impact homes on Pine Avenue and Park Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 0.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage on Wednesday with a maximum value of 5.7 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.0 feet on 09/26/2004. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 0.1 Mon 9 pm -0.4 1.2 -0.2 -0.5 0.3 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning.Tuesday afternoon at 330 PM EDT.
